article_title: Activists, former judge ‘indict’ NC lawmakers for denying Medicaid expansion
article_text: Shirley Fulton, a retired Superior Court judge from Charlotte, presided Monday over a mock grand jury hearing designed to shame North Carolina legislators into expanding Medicaid.

article_metadata.news-keywords: NC Medicaid expansion, Rev. William Barber II, indict
